page.title: 02ARMED FORCES 03800597
page.content: {Redesdale}range started in 1910.The whole range extends to 56,000 acres, most of it in{Northumberland National Park.It has 30 tenanted farms.A small part occupies our area.All{three {services}use it including{Territorial, {R.A.F. Reserve, Cadet}Forces.Most {N.A.T.O.}Nations have been here: Canadians,Germans,Italians,Belgians, Dutch & Americans, (approx 300,000 troops yearly).Troops fire all{weapons from pistols to 155mm. cannon and guided weapons from{helicopters and } {light track vehicles.}Aircraft fire rockets,guided weapons, machine guns and drop inert bombs.Demolition training is also carried out.Besides live firing there are dry training zones.Troops normally stay 14 days/4 weeks.There is{accommodation}for 1700 soldiers at{Redesdale camp}& for 700 more at bivouac sites in the area.
